hero.description: With 35 years, 1,000 attorneys, and $25 billion recovered, we fight to get you what you deserve—start your free case review anytime by text, phone, or online.
features: THE FEE IS FREE, UNLESS WE WIN

bigWins.title: The Right Firm for Big Wins
bigWins.description: Insurance companies know us—and they know we fight for every dollar.
bigWins.disclaimer: Results may vary depending on your particular facts and legal circumstances. The attorneys shown in these photos may not be licensed in your state. To find an attorney licensed in your area, please visit our attorney page.

cards.title: Injured in a car accident?
cards.description: We've helped thousands recover medical bills, lost wages, and more after crashes caused by negligence.

cards.title: Hurt in a slip and fall?
cards.description: From wet floors to unsafe conditions, we fight to hold property owners accountable for your injuries.

cards.title: Injured on the job?
cards.description: We guide workers through the claims process to secure the benefits they deserve for workplace injuries.

faces.title: The Faces of Justice
faces.description: Our 1,000+ attorneys are whip-smart, bighearted, and passionate people who wouldn't hesitate to go the extra mile for their clients.
faces.disclaimer: The attorneys shown in these videos may not be licensed in your state. To find an attorney licensed in your area, please visit our attorney page.

compensation.title: We're here to help you recover compensation for:

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Unsure what to do next? With 35 years of experience, our personal injury lawyers will guide you every step of the way.

steps.title: Contact Us 24/7 - It's Free
steps.description: Start with a free, no-obligation case evaluation online, by phone, or via text. Tell us your story—we're here to listen.

steps.title: Meet Your Dedicated Attorney
steps.description: Once your case qualifies, we'll pair you with a lawyer and a supportive team. They'll handle everything, keep you informed, and answer all your questions.

steps.title: We Fight For More
steps.description: Your legal team will build a strong case, negotiate with insurance companies, and pursue the maximum results you deserve.
steps.link: Learn more about the case process

fighting.title: Fighting for the People
fighting.description: There's a reason we're America's largest injury law firm: our size means we can help more people, in more places, and fight for the justice they deserve.

pain.title: WE KNOW YOUR PAIN.
pain.description: John Morgan's brother Tim was injured as a teen. Their experience with a lawyer was a nightmare. John spent 35 years building a firm to do better for families like his. And yours.
pain.disclaimer: The attorney featured above is licensed in Florida. For a full list of attorneys in your state please visit our attorney page. Results may vary depending on your particular facts and legal circumstances.

insights.title: Insights & Resources
insights.description: Explore articles and resources to guide you through your options and making informed decisions after an accident.
articles: The Basics: What is a personal injury lawsuit?
How Much is My Personal Injury Case Worth?

feeFreeForm.title: THE FEE IS FREE®
feeFreeForm.description: Only pay if we win. Contact us 24/7.
feeFreeForm.subtitle: It's Easy to Get Started
feeFreeForm.intro: Provide a few simple details about your injury and our team will take it from there.

intro.headline: MORGAN & MORGAN
intro.description: After 35 years, Morgan & Morgan remains a family firm dedicated to fighting for the average American family.

footer.officesList: Orlando, Fort Myers, Jacksonville, Miami, Atlanta, Tampa, Los Angeles, Boston, New York City, Philadelphia, Nashville
footer.officeLink: For a full list of locations in your area please visit our {{link}} page.
footer.disclaimer: This site is designed to be accessible to and usable by people with and without disabilities. Please contact us if you encounter an accessibility or usability issue on this site. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee a similar outcome. Cases will be handled by attorneys licensed in the local jurisdiction. Cases may be associated with, or referred to, other law firms as co-counsel or referral counsel. Based on select nationwide reviews.
